name: Lumat
Lore: 'Ewok archer. Wood carver. Tribal elder that advises Chief Chirpa. Crafts and maintains weapons.',
Text: 'Deploys only on Endor. Power and forfeit +1 for each Light side icon at same Endor site. When on Endor, adds 1 to total weapon destiny whenever you have any Ewok using an Ewok weapon at an Endor site.',
